                                                              # åŸºæœ¬é…ç½®

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

const path = require("node:path")

module.exports = {
  // æ¨¡å¼
  mode: "development", // or "production"
  
  // å…¥å£
  entry: "./src/main.js",
  
  // å‡ºå£
  output: {
    path: path.resolve(__dirname, "dist"),
    filename: "main.js", // å¦‚æœé…ç½®äº†ä»£ç åˆ†åŒ…, éœ€è¦æ”¹æˆ "[chunkhash].js", é¿å…å†²çª
    clean: true // è‡ªåŠ¨æ¸…ç©ºä¸Šæ¬¡æ‰“åŒ…èµ„æº
  },
  
  // é¢„å¤„ç†å™¨
  module: {
    rules: []
  },
  
  // æ’ä»¶
  plugins: [],
  
  // å…¶ä»–é…ç½®
  stats: "errors-only" // ç»ˆç«¯æ§åˆ¶å°åªè¾“å‡º error ä¿¡æ¯
}

                                                              # é¢„å¤„ç†å™¨

                                                              # å¤„ç†æ ·å¼èµ„æº

                                                              npm i style-loader css-loader -D

                                                              npm i less-loader -D

                                                              npm i sass-loader -D

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: ["style-loader", "css-loader"]
      },
      {
        test: /\.less$/,
        use: ["style-loader", "css-loader", "less-loader"]
      },
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/,
        use: ["style-loader", "css-loader", "sass-loader"]
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                              # å°† CSS æ‰“åŒ…æˆå•ç‹¬æ–‡ä»¶

                                                              npm i mini-css-extract-plugin -D

                                                              Webpack é»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨ JS åŠ¨æ€åˆ›å»º style æ ‡ç­¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆæ ·å¼ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å°† CSS æ‰“åŒ…æˆå•ç‹¬çš„æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ link æ ‡ç­¾åŠ è½½ã€‚

                                                              /* webpack.prod.js */

const MiniCssExtractPlugin = require("mini-css-extract-plugin")

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: [MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader, "css-loader"] // ä¸éœ€è¦ style-loader
      },
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/,
        use: [MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader, "css-loader", "sass-loader"]
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new MiniCssExtractPlugin({
      filename: "static/css/main.css"
    })
  ]
}

                                                              # å¤„ç† CSS å…¼å®¹æ€§

                                                              npm i postcss-loader postcss postcss-preset-env -D

                                                              /* webpack.prod.js */

const getStyleLoaders = (preProcessor) => {
  return [
    MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader,
    "css-loader",
    {
      loader: "postcss-loader",
      options: {
        postcssOptions: {
          plugins: [
            "postcss-preset-env" // èƒ½è§£å†³å¤§å¤šæ•°æ ·å¼å…¼å®¹æ€§é—®é¢˜
          ]
        }
      }
    },
    preProcessor
  ].filter(Boolean) // ç­›é€‰çœŸå€¼
}

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.css$/,
        use: getStyleLoaders()
      },
      {
        test: /\.less$/,
        use: getStyleLoaders("less-loader")
      },
      {
        test: /\.s[ac]ss$/,
        use: getStyleLoaders("sass-loader")
      }
    ]
  }
}

{
  "browserslist": ["last 2 version", "> 1%", "not dead"] // ä¸å…¼å®¹ä½ç‰ˆæœ¬æµè§ˆå™¨
}

                                                              # å‹ç¼© CSS

                                                              npm i css-minimizer-webpack-plugin -D

                                                              /* webpack.prod.js */

const CssMinimizerPlugin = require("css-minimizer-webpack-plugin")

module.exports = {
  plugins: [
    new CssMinimizerPlugin()
  ]
}

                                                              # å¤„ç†å›¾ç‰‡èµ„æº

                                                              åœ¨ Webpack4 ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬é€šè¿‡ url-loader å’Œ file-loader å¯¹å›¾ç‰‡èµ„æºè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼Œ

                                                              è€Œ Webpack5 å·²ç»å†…ç½®äº†è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ª loaderï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬åªéœ€è¦ç®€å•çš„é…ç½®å°±è¡Œäº†ã€‚

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.(png|jpe?g|gif|webp)$/,
        type: "asset",
        parser: {
          // ä¼˜åŒ–
          dataUrlCondition: {
            maxSize: 10 * 1024 // å°äº 10kb çš„å›¾ç‰‡ä¼šè¢«å¤„ç†æˆ data URI (base64) æ ¼å¼
          }
        },
        generator: {
          filename: "static/images/[hash:8][ext][query]", // è¾“å‡ºè·¯å¾„åŠæ‰“åŒ…åçš„å›¾ç‰‡å
        }
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                              # å¤„ç† Babel

                                                              npm i babel-loader @babel/core @babel/preset-env -D

                                                              npm i @babel/preset-react -D

                                                              npm i @babel/preset-typescript -D

                                                              /* babel.config.js */

module.exports = {
  // é¢„è®¾
  presets: [
    "@babel/preset-env", // å¤„ç† JS
    "@babel/preset-react", // å¤„ç† JSX
    "@babel/preset-typescript" // å¤„ç† TS
  ]
}

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.js$/,
        exclude: /node_modules/, // æ’é™¤ node_modules ä»£ç ä¸ç¼–è¯‘
        loader: "babel-loader"
      }
    ]
  }
}

module.exports = {
  module: {
    plugins: [
      new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
        template: "./public/index.html" // æŒ‡å®šæºæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ‰“åŒ…ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ª html æ–‡ä»¶
      })
    ]
  }
}

                                                              # å¤„ç† Eslint

                                                              npm i eslint-webpack-plugin eslint -D

                                                              /* .eslintrc.js */

module.exports = {
  // ç»§æ‰¿å…¶ä»–è§„åˆ™
  extends: ["eslint:recommended"],
  // ç¯å¢ƒå˜é‡
  env: {
    node: true, // å¯ç”¨ node ä¸­å…¨å±€å˜é‡
    browser: true // å¯ç”¨æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­å…¨å±€å˜é‡
  },
  // è§£æé€‰é¡¹
  parserOptions: {
    ecmaVersion: 6, // ES è¯­æ³•ç‰ˆæœ¬
    sourceType: "module" // ES æ¨¡å—åŒ–
  },
  // å…·ä½“æ£€æŸ¥è§„åˆ™
  // æˆ‘ä»¬çš„è§„åˆ™ä¼šè¦†ç›–æ‰ç»§æ‰¿çš„è§„åˆ™ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æƒ³è¦ä¿®æ”¹è§„åˆ™ç›´æ¥æ”¹å°±æ˜¯äº†
  rules: {
    "no-var": "error", // ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨ var å®šä¹‰å˜é‡
    "semi": "off" // ç¦æ­¢ä½¿ç”¨åˆ†å·
  }
  // ...
  // å…¶ä»–è§„åˆ™è¯¦è§ï¼šhttps://eslint.bootcss.com/docs/user-guide/configuring
}

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

const ESLintWebpackPlugin = require("eslint-webpack-plugin")

module.exports = {
  plugins: [
    new ESLintWebpackPlugin({
      context: path.resolve(__dirname, "src") // å‡ºå£
    })
  ]
}

  }
}

                                                              ä»£ç åˆ†åŒ…ã€‚Webpack é»˜è®¤ä¼šæŠŠæ‰€æœ‰ä»£ç æ‰“åŒ…æˆä¸€ä¸ª JS æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè¿™æ ·ä½“ç§¯å¤ªå¤§äº†ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å¯ä»¥å¯¹ä»£ç è¿›è¡Œåˆ†åŒ…å‡å°æ‰“åŒ…ä½“ç§¯ã€‚

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

module.exports = {
  optimization: {
    splitChunks: {
      cacheGroups: {
        moment: {
          name: "moment",
          chunks: "all",
          test: /[\\/]node_modules[\\/]moment[\\/]/
        },
        common: {
          name: "common", // å…¬å…±ä¾èµ–ã€é‡å¤ä¾èµ–
          chunks: "all",
          minChunks: 2 // å¼•ç”¨æ¬¡æ•°å¤§äº 2 å°±ä¼šè¢«åˆ†å‰²å‡ºæ¥
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

                                                              npm i ts-loader -D

                                                              npm i typescript -D

                                                              æ”¯æŒ TSã€‚

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

const path = require("node:path")

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.ts$/,
        use: "ts-loader"
      }
    ]
  }
}

                                                              npm i vue-loader -D

                                                              npm i html-webpack-plugin -D

                                                              æ”¯æŒ Vueã€‚

                                                              /* webpack.config.js */

const HtmlWebpackPlugin = require("html-webpack-plugin")
const { VueLoaderPlugin } = require("vue-loader")

module.exports = {
  module: {
    rules: [
      {
        test: /\.ts$/,
        use: {
          loader: "ts-loader",
          options: {
            appendTsSuffixTo: [/\.vue$/] // æ”¯æŒ <script lang="ts">
          }
        }
      },
      {
        test: /\.vue$/,
        use: "vue-loader"
      }
    ]
  },
  plugins: [
    new HtmlWebpackPlugin({
      template: "./public/index.html"
    }),
    new VueLoaderPlugin()
  ]
}

                                                              å£°æ˜ shim.d.ts æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œè®© TS è¯†åˆ« .vue åç¼€ã€‚

                                                              /* shim.d.ts */

declare module "*.vue" {
  import { DefineComponent } from "vue"
  const component: DefineComponent<{}, {}, any>
  export default component
}

          chunks: "all",
          minChunks: 2 // å¼•ç”¨æ¬¡æ•°å¤§äº 2 å°±ä¼šè¢«åˆ†å‰²å‡ºæ¥
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
